txt.en: Fallen men are scattered upon the ground at the Fords of Isen.\n\nYou should search the men on the ground.
Fight your way to Grimbold at the Ford.
Tell Grimbold that it is over
You have indicated that it is time to retreat
You return to the fords from pursuing a band of Uruks to no avail, and find a scene of utter chaos and despair....
Ask the soldiers what they wish to do
See if any of the fallen soldiers live ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Grimbold can be found standing amidst the carnage at the Fords.\n\nYou should speak with Grimbold.
Defeated an enemy ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Elfhelm, one of the leaders fighting alongside Erkenbrand at the Fords of Isen, wishes to fall back at once.
See what the soldiers choose to do
'You think me mad, Elfhelm? If we retreat, the doors to Rohan open for the forces of Isengard, and they will destroy us one and all. We must make our last stand!'
Ask the dying soldier what happened while you were gone
Find Grimbold amongst the chaos
The soldiers have left Grimbold, choosing to retreat while there is still time
Grimbold can be found standing amidst the carnage at the Fords.\n\nYou should tell Grimbold no.
Leave with the soldiers while there is still time. Grimbold will follow if he is wise....
Tell Grimbold <rgb=#FF0000>no</rgb>
'You...you do not mean to fight.' His expression is devastated.\n\nYou tell Grimbold the truth -- that the battle is lost, and it is time to retreat to rally what little strength is left.
Convince Grimbold to retreat
You should look back to see if Grimbold is following
Tell Grimbold no
'The Uruks have us nearly surrounded. There has been enough death today.'
Approach the ford
Grimbold stands dumbfounded at Théodred's grave, unmoving....
Grimbold wishes to stand and fight to the death
Defeat enemies at the Ford ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'My...my lord Elfhelm!'\n\nYou ask the dying man what happened here.
Grimbold's voice is low when next he speaks....
'Elfhelm! You are back! Now we can give them a battle to remember.'
This soldier is unwilling to lay down his life for a lost cause

Grimbold stands at Prince Théodred's grave at the Fords of Isen.

You should tell Grimbold no.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest requires emotes. Select your target and perform the desired emote.</rgb>
'We must hurry, Lord Elfhelm! The Uruks are everywhere, and our escape will be narrow....'
Grimbold stands at Prince Théodred's grave at the Fords of Isen.
Follow the other soldiers in retreat
Erkenbrand cannot help now, for the Uruks have come between you
<rgb=#FF0000>Beckon</rgb> to Grimbold
Fallen men are scattered upon the ground at the Fords of Isen.\n\nYou should search the men on the ground.
It is clear that the battle has taken a dire turn. There is no hope....
The soldiers have gathered around Grimbold and yourself.\n\nYou should ask the soldiers what they think.
Grimbold is at the Fords.
An injured soldier lies ahead at the river's edge.\n\nYou should run to the injured man's side.
This man draws no breath....
Search for Grimbold among the chaos at the ford.
The men have retreated backwards into the Westfold, and you should follow.
Instance: The Fords Have Fallen

Grimbold is still standing at Théodred's grave.

You should <rgb=#FF0000>beckon</rgb> to Grimbold.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You should select your target to perform this emote.</rgb>
Listen to Grimbold
